channel.title: Homes on Douglas O. Cardoso
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Douglas O. Cardoso

item.description: I am an assistant professor at the Department of Computer Engineering of CEFET-RJ Petr√≥polis. My research interests include clustering, open set recognition, data streams mining and weightless neural networks. I also coordinate a programming contests training project, preparing students to competitions as the ACM International Collegiate Programming Contest.
